title: The Sheriff

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Investigate.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you Investigate a player, you randomly learn one thing from this list:
- Whether they appear innocent or suspicious.
- Who they visit tonight.
- If the player you visit appears suspicious, you learn both.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5342
*He remains a bulwark of order in a tumultuous desert of banditry.*
